meanings.definition: A person who participates in trapshooting.
meanings.sent1: The trapshooters gathered at the shooting range for a competition.
meanings.sent2: Many trapshooters enjoy spending time outdoors honing their skills.
meanings.sent3: The trapshooters joked that they were better at hitting clay pigeons than real ones.
meanings.sent4: The group of trapshooters were like sharpshooters with shotguns.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shotguns echoed through the air as the trapshooters took aim.

meanings.sent1: The trapshooters were all skilled marksmen.
meanings.sent2: We watched as the trapshooters lined up to take their shots.
meanings.sent3: The trapshooters' accuracy was so impressive, they never missed a target.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with trapshooters ready to showcase their shooting abilities.
meanings.sent5: The group of trapshooters practiced diligently to improve their aim.
